ygData.messageBody:
sounds exactly right, not sure why you are having trouble. possible your
charisma is too low for charm to last long enough to be effective, or your
level is too low for charm to stick for long. i do understand your
frustration though, i was always afraid of learning how to charm well and
did not use until i hit 50 hehe.

Shada

> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

> - Set up a hotkey panel with Selo's, Charm, "/pet attack",
> "/pet back off".
> - Equip drum and fire up Selo's.
> - Sneak up to the bros and Charm one.
> - Assuming Charm sticks, the other will probably immediately
> attack it due
> to its inheriting my factions, but if not, click on the other
> brother and
> hit "/pet attack" hotkey.
> - Click on original charmee.
> - Start Selo's.
> - Watch ensuing battle.
> - When Charm breaks and brother runs toward me, hit Charm again.
> - Assuming Charm sticks, the charmee *should* return to previous "/pet
> attack" status.
> - Repeat until one is dead.
> - Once one is dead, the problem shifts to a kite or
> chain/fear issue to
> finish survivor off.
>
> I've tried this. Hell I can't even make this work with Orc
> Centurians in
> East Commonlands. Either I totally misunderstand something
> or I'm just not
> coordinated to pull it off.
>
> Crier
